phones.name: Iphone 15 Pro Max 1TB
phones.label: Hot
phones.description: As part of our efforts to reach carbon neutrality by 2030, iPhone 15 Pro Max do not include a power adapter or EarPods. Included in the box is a USB‑C Charge Cable that supports fast charging and is compatible with USB‑C power adapters and computer ports.

phones.name: Iphone 15 Pro Max 2TB
phones.description: Included with Iphone is a USB‑C Charge Cable that supports fast charging and is compatible with USB‑C power adapters and computer ports. We encourage you to use any compatible USB‑C power adapter. If you need a new Apple power adapter or headphones, they are available for purchase.

phones.name: Samsung galaxy S24 Ultra 1TB | 12GB
phones.label: New
phones.description: A quintessential ConFusion experience, is it a vada or is it a donut?

phones.name: Samsung galaxy S23 Ultra 512GB | 12GB
phones.description: A delectable, semi-sweet New York Style Cheese Cake, with Graham cracker crust and spiced with Indian cardamoms

phones.name: Google Pixel 8 Pro 256GB
phones.description: The Pixel 8 Pro camera system includes updated, pro-level cameras for better low-light photos, sharper selfies and Pixel's best zoom ever, and Pro controls enable advanced camera settings and full-resolution photography.

promotions.name: Weekend Grand Sale
promotions.label: New
promotions.description: Get ready for an unbeatable phone sale promotion featuring the latest models from top brands, sleek and modern designs, high-performance features, long-lasting battery life, and stunning display quality. Enjoy exclusive benefits including free shipping on all orders, a complimentary screen protector and case, a one-year warranty, and 24/7 customer support—all starting at just $299.99. Hurry and grab this limited-time offer to experience the best in mobile technology!

leaders.name: Peter Pan
leaders.description: Our CEO, Peter, attributes his success to his hardworking East Asian immigrant parents who made the arduous journey to America to provide their children with a better future. Inspired by his mother’s resourcefulness, Peter developed a passion for technology and innovation. He brings his zeal for cutting-edge mobile technology and exceptional customer service to our shop, leading our team to provide the best products and services to our customers.

leaders.name: Danny Dick
leaders.description: Our CFO, Danny, comes from a family with a long-standing tradition in business and finance. His experiences growing up in a family-run business environment have given him a keen understanding of financial management and strategic planning. Danny's philosophy is, 'Every investment is an opportunity, and every opportunity is an investment.'

leaders.name: Agumbe Tang
leaders.description: Blessed with an exceptional understanding of technology, Agumbe, our CTO, ensures that every product we offer meets the highest standards of quality and innovation. Our team strives to meet his exacting standards. He lives by his motto, 'Innovation drives success.'

leaders.name: Sam Dickus
leaders.description: An award-winning sales manager with extensive international experience, Sam has worked with some of the biggest names in the tech industry. He specializes in creating exceptional customer experiences and says, 'Great products and great service make happy customers.'
